title: Episode 20: Five Dysfunctions of a Team
description:
Today I discuss the book The Five Dysfunctions of a Team by Patrick Lencioni. I really enjoyed this book and it not only helped shape the way I operate in teams, but it also shaped the way I operated in communities and ultimately how I hope to operate as I continue to build this channel. I hope you enjoy! 

Book Link: https://www.amazon.com/Five-Dysfunctions-Team-Leadership-Fable/dp/0787960756/ref=sr_1_1?crid=2GCWWDRR8HQPE&dchild=1&keywords=five+dysfunctions+of+a+team&qid=1620274377&sprefix=five+dysfunc%2Caps%2C-1&sr=8-1
